November is Music Month

November is Music Month all across the Bradford District. There will be lots of live music to enjoy as well as workshops and activities where you can make music yourself.

There are events throughout the region, across different locations, celebrating music of all types.

You can find out more about all the events at the Music Month Website.

You can always find live events in Bingley along with regular music making activities in our district right here on this website. We’ve pulled them altogether in one long list here so that you can easily see what’s happening in Bingley Music Town throughout the month.

Members Meet Ups in November

Meet other Bingley Music Town members during music month at these events.

  • Wed 1st Nov: Pick up and Play session at the Chip N Ern, Bingley from 8pm.
  • Mon 6th Nov: Bingley Music Town First Birthday Party at Bingley First Monday Folk, Ryshworth Club, Crossflatts (7pm -10pm).
  • Wed 8th Nov: Bingley Music Town Steering Group meeting - all welcome. Cardigan House Bingley, 7pm - 8pm.
  • Sun 12th Nov: Buskers open mic at Martinez Wine Bar, Bingley - from 7pm.
  • Thurs 16th Nov: Bingley Ukulele Group, The Peacock Bar, Bingley, (group is 7 - 9, suggest we’re there from 6pm).
  • Sat 18th Nov: Laurel Canyon Union at the Brown Cow, Bingley (meet from 8pm, music starts at 9).
  • Wed 22nd Nov: Blues Night Martinez Wine Bar from 7pm.

Bingley - Music Month - November 2023

Wednesday 1 November

Bingley Singing For Fun
A friend group of people that meet each week to sing for fun.
11:30 - 12:30, Bingley Arts Centre

Pick up and Play Session
Join in with or just come and listen to traditional folk music played by local musicians.
approx 8pm, Chip ‘n’ Ern, Bingley

Bingley Handbell Ringers
If you would like to try Handbell Ringing come along to a practice night or contact the group to find out more.
7 - 9pm, Church House, Bingley.

Blues Night
Live music from some of the best blues artists around. Check our live listings for details.
approx 7pm, Martinez Bingley Wine Shop & Wine Bar, Bingley

Thursday 2 November

Cullingworth Ukulele Group
Free ukulele lessons for beginners.
10:30am at St John’s Room in Cullingworth.

All Together Now
Yorkshire Community Choir based in Baildon, Bingley, Harrogate & Skipton.
1.30-3.00pm, Bingley Methodist Church

Every First Thursday of the month

Bingley Ukulele Group
A fun group of like minded people who enjoy playing UKULELE. Everyone welcome.
7pm - 9pm The Peacock Bar Bingley.

Friday 3 November

We don’t know of any events on this date yet. Contact ucds if you know of something going on.

Saturday 4 November

Killer Rhapsody - a Night of Queen

Bingley Arts Centre

A tribute to the extraordinary music of Queen

From: 19:30

Price: £18.00 or 4 for £60

Buy Tickets

Every First Saturday of the month
Jam Session
For acoustic instruments (or lightly amplified electric instruments using battery power).
This is a Jam Session where somebody leads-off a song and everybody joins in … quite a different beast to Open Mic events where songs etc are performed.
3pm-5pm, The Flappit Inn (A629 Keighley to Halifax road, near Cullingworth)

Sunday 5 November

Bingley Tower Bell Ringers
We ring on Sundays, 9.45-10.30am for morning service and practice on Tuesday evenings, 7.30-9.00pm. We are always willing to welcome new recruits to train and become part of our team.
9.45-10.30am All Saints Parish Church, Bingley

Sunday 5 November

Bingley Tower Bell Ringers
We ring on Sundays, 9.45-10.30am for morning service and practice on Tuesday evenings, 7.30-9.00pm. We are always willing to welcome new recruits to train and become part of our team.
9.45-10.30am All Saints Parish Church, Bingley

Monday 6 November

Bingley First Monday Folk presents

Ben Greenwell

Ryshworth Club

A special event where we will also be celebrating the first birthday of Bingley Music Town. There will be cake!
Ben Greenwell is a singer/songwriter, harmonica player and guitarist from Yorkshire. With solid grooves and emotive whaling blues harmonica, Greenwell’s soulful voice takes the listener on a journey as he sings about life, loss, love and truth. Bingley First Monday Folk is a little folk club held on the first Monday evening of each month. No entry fee, but donations and a raffle keep the event running.

From: 19:00

Price: Free

All Together Now
Yorkshire Community Choir based in Baildon, Bingley, Harrogate & Skipton.
10.00-11.30am, Bingley Methodist Church

Bradford Airedale Youth Choir
An exciting group of contemporary choirs for young people aged 6-26 years, rehearsing in Bingley on Monday evenings.

Pick up and Play Session
Join in with or just come and listen to traditional folk music played by local musicians.
approx 8pm, The Brown Cow, Bingley.

Voices of Yorkshire
A fun, friendly and relaxed choir. We welcome all abilities.
8-9pm, Bradford And Bingley Rugby Club

Every First Monday of the month

Bingley First Monday Folk
A little folk club featuring top quality musicians and the best raffle in Yorkshire.
7pm Ryshworth Club, Crossflatts

We ring on Sundays, 9.45-10.30am for morning service and practice on Tuesday evenings, 7.30-9.00pm. We are always willing to welcome new recruits to train and become part of our team.

Every Second Thursday of the month

The Shed Planners Association - BFD
An open mic and jam session at the Highfield, Idle, Bradford. From 9pm on the second Thursday of every month. Run by Bingley musicians. PA, drums and backline provided.
8pm The Highfield, Idle

Jack O’Malley

From: 20:00

Price: Free

Saturday 11 November

Manorlands Hospice Fundraiser

The Birches Eldwick

With music from a Smokie tribute band and fabulous 60’s/70’s dance numbers.

From: 19:30

Price: £20

Sunday 12 November

Remembrance Day Parade and Service

Myrtle Park

The annual Remebrance Day Service and Parade will feature two bands and the Steeton Male Voice Choir. Starts at 10.30 at the Market Square in town and then the parade marches to the Cenotaph in Myrtle Park for the 11am service.

From: 10:30

Price: Free

Bingley Tower Bell Ringers
We ring on Sundays, 9.45-10.30am for morning service and practice on Tuesday evenings, 7.30-9.00pm. We are always willing to welcome new recruits to train and become part of our team.
9.45-10.30am All Saints Parish Church, Bingley

Every Second Sunday of the month

Buskers (open mic)
An open mic platform for local artists to show us what they have. Usually a 15 minute slot and you can do what you like performance wise, sing, play, tell jokes or whatever!
7pm, Martinez Bingley Wine Shop & Wine Bar, Bingley

Every Third Tuesday of the month
Goldies - A good old sing-a-long
Songs from the 50’s onwards, followed by bingo and afternoon tea.
Goldies sessions are open to everyone but aim particularly to combat isolation in older adults. The group is dementia friendly and free to all residents of Bingley.
For more information, please contact Carole on 01274 560539.
2pm - 4pm Eldwick Church , Eldwick

Get involved

Why not become a member and get involved to make a difference?

Sign up to our mailing list to stay informed about what’s happening.

If you have an idea for music in our town, or you’re already doing something, then we’d love to hear it.
Please contact us and tell us all about it.

Can you help? See our Help Wanted page for more opportunities to get involved.

Stay up to date with all our latest news.
